c74object.name: hoa.2d.projector~
c74object.description: hoa.2d.projector~ discretizes the ambisonic soundfield into an array of channels and gives an access to a new sound domain.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

objarg.name: number-of-channels
objarg.description: Second argument sets the number of channels.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Array of circular harmonic signals to be projected.
method.description: Array of circular harmonic signals to be projected.

c74object.discussion: hoa.2d.projector~ discretizes the ambisonic soundfield into an array of channels and gives an access to a new sound domain.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: hoa.2d.projector~ discretizes the ambisonic soundfield into an array of channels and gives an access to a new sound domain.
